name: After the Flood
description:
Dive into the heart of a haunted town in 'After the Flood,' a single-player horror adventure. Play as a detective investigating a centuries-old curse, facing roaming dangers and unraveling dark secrets. With no means to fight, you must run and hide to survive. Gather clues, confront the past, and lift the curse before it's too late.

Synopsis:


Drawn by rumors of strange occurrences and supernatural phenomena, the detective ventures into the heart of the desolate town, determined to uncover the truth behind its tragic past.

As the detective explores the town's eerie streets and decrepit buildings, they encounter chilling manifestations of the curse, including roaming monsters and malevolent spirits. Armed with only their wits and keen investigative skills, players must navigate treacherous environments, solve puzzles, and gather clues to piece together the dark history of the town and the events that led to its downfall.

Features:


  • Uncover the Dark Secrets: Step into the shoes of a determined detective bent on unraveling the truth behind the sinister events that befell the town. Unravel the mystery behind the curse that brought the town to ruin, driven by a vengeful witch's wrath. Delve deep into the haunted remains of the town, as whispers of the past guide you toward the truth.

  • Survive the Horrors: As a detective caught in the grip of a malevolent force, you cannot fight the creatures lurking within the shadows. Your only means of survival is to run and hide from the relentless lone monster that stalks your every move. But beware of what hides in the darkness of the abandoned buildings. Feel the adrenaline rush as you navigate treacherous environments, seeking sanctuary and evading the nightmarish entities that haunt your path.
